title: 游戏崩溃，内附错误报告
author: yangkaibo1123
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Would you like a cupcake?

Description: Initializing game

replies.author: GWLAN
replies.txt_content: config里有个splash.properties。用记事本打开把enable改成false试试。

replies.author: yangkaibo1123
replies.txt_content:
GWLAN 发表于 2015-8-22 08:22
config里有个splash.properties。用记事本打开把enable改成false试试。
大触，又是你，完美的解决了我的问题，还有能不能教我怎么看错误报告
